dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1955
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reasserts the ideal and hope of forming communes and farming communities. Tales of Tamar's mischievous children and the value of reading scripture.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 696 1955-12-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
